name: Graveyard Golf (itch)
description:
Graveyard Golf!

Last project for the school term, was tasked to create a 3d mini golf game ! Went with a graveyard/spooky theme and feel like it turned out good! Let me know your thought :D 

Comment below if you want any changes! 

Created by: Lucidly                                 "Lucas Liberatore" 

Music: BlueSky                                          "Jacob Liberatore"

Thanks for playing :D
